body.name: Lego Sonic The Hedgehog Sonic’s Speed Sphere Challenge 76990 Building Toy Set, Sonic Playset with Speed Sphere Launcher and 3 Sonic Figures, Fun Birthday Gift for Young Fans Ages 6 and Up
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 43 mins
features: Action play for Sonic fans – Inspire kids to build a course for Sonic the Hedgehog with this LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog Sonic’s Speed Sphere Challenge (76990) building toy set for kids ages 6 and up
Includes Sonic’s speed sphere – Comes with the speed sphere and launcher to propel Sonic through the course. Kids can set the sphere spinning as it knocks over the obstacles to save the animal
3 Sonic figures and accessories – The set comes with Sonic the Hedgehog, the iconic Moto Bug Badnik, Sonic’s Flicky friend and lots of accessories for role play
Creative play – After sending Sonic through the course, kids can enjoy a change of pace creating stories for Sonic and the Flicky as they relax with a drink and a chili dog and play with the DJ decks

Fun birthday gift for young Sonic fans ages 6 and up – This LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog playset makes a fun birthday, holiday or any-other-day gift for kids ages 6 and up who love imaginative action play and gamer toys
body.description: Kids ages 6 and up who love Sonic can help save the day with Sonic’s Speed Sphere Challenge (76990), including 3 Sonic figures. The Sonic playset features a speed sphere and launcher to propel Sonic across the course as he defeats the Moto Bug Badnik and sets Sonic’s Flicky pal free. Kids will love the challenge as they use the speed sphere launcher to help Sonic collect the Rings, pass through the gateway and go up the ramp to reach the Chaos Emerald. This building toy set is packed with fast action play but that’s not all – it also offers kids role-play opportunities as they help care for the Flicky. After defeating the Badnik, kids can act out the story as Sonic relaxes with his favorite chili dog and plays on his DJ decks. Fast action fun meets creative play with LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog playsets. Fans of the Blue Blur can create scenes inspired by their favorite Sonic adventures, making for a fun birthday gift for young Sonic fans ages 6 and up. When it’s time for a change of pace, kids enjoy imaginative play caring for Sonic’s animal friends. Contains 292 pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Creative adventures for Sonic fans Fast paced fun meets imaginative play in this LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog Sonic’s Speed Sphere Challenge buildable playset.
Launch the speed sphere Kids can build a course for Sonic, then use the speed sphere to knock over the obstacles and save the Flicky.

LEGO Sonic the Hedgehog Sonic’s Speed Sphere Challenge Includes Sonic’s speed sphere Use the speed sphere to propel Sonic through the course. Collect the Rings Kids can have fun helping Sonic collect the Rings. Capture the Chaos Emerald Navigate the gateway and ramp to reach the Chaos Emerald.
Enter a digital world of building Builders can zoom in, rotate sets in 3D and track progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app.
A gift for Sonic fans This set comes with a Sonic, Moto bug Badnik and the Flicky figures plus lots of accessories for role play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son and I put this Lego set together as a team and we enjoyed the time spent together and the end result he loved. I would recommend to any parent with a son who is into Legos it is a fun activity to do together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but fun!
reviews.reviewText: Had many little parts to play with and mostly entertained the child for a good chunk of time. Easy to build and use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a great set for any child that loves sonic and likes to build Legos, best of both world. My children are very into Legos for several years it keeps them entertained and in one place longer than most toys and sonic is the newest phase in my home so it works for us. Small pieces so beware if you have toddlers but overall I love this set and so do my kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was super cute. Our son loved it. There are a couple of pieces that don’t attach to anything and are there as accessories, like the hot dog and soda cans. Just a note for if you have small children because these are the first pieces to get lost or in the carpet somewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Christmas gift
reviews.reviewText: My 4 almost 5 year old son loves sonic and was so excited to get this for a Christmas gift. He was able to put a lot of it together by looking at the box, but need some help with other parts. All in all a great rainy day activity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My nephew loved it
reviews.reviewText: It was fun to put together with my nephew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loved it
reviews.reviewText: Such a fun Lego set. My 10 year old loved putting this together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Tactile Kids
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a young child who loves building things and he loved it!!
Purchased for a birthday gift, a combo of chilfs 2 favorite things sonic and lego. Fine motor skills. Building, creative, fun, role playing.

reviews.reviewerName: Fácil de usar, fácil de colocar, sus funciones son óptimas y cumple con su función!! Recomendable 100%!!
reviews.reviewText: Cuando aparecen ofertas así, hay que aprovecharlas! La caja llegó en buen estado y no dudo que el contenido venga igual!
Dei de presente e ele amou o presente, ficou super feliz!Montamos tudo juntos foi bem divertido

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Lego set with lots of cool deails
reviews.reviewText: My 7 year old son loves this lego set. He enjoyed building it with little help. He is a huge sonic fan and was very excited to see a lego set with his favorite character. He has enjoyed playing with this set after building it. Often time other lego sets will quickly end up in the mixed lego bin, but he has kept this one sepeate to keep playing with. There are lots of fun deatils like rings for sonic to collect and chili dogs to eat! You can put sonic in a sphere and launch him over a ramp.

reviews.reviewTitle: chegou rapido o brinquedo o muito divertido e criativo
reviews.reviewText: meu filho adorou o lego, e como ele gosta muito do sonic de todos os legos que ele tem essse foi o que ele mais gostou
